snippet: The N.C.A.A. is prohibiting the creation of new bowl games after three teams with 5-7 records were needed to fill the record number of bowls last season.
abstract: NCAA enacts three-year moratorium on creation of any new bowl games; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. is prohibiting the creation of new bowl games after three teams with 5-7 records were needed to fill the record number of bowls last season.

headline.main: Three-Year Moratorium on New Bowl Games
